UPDATE sales SET total_price = total_price * 0.9, quantity = CASE WHEN sale_date >= '2021-01-01' THEN quantity + 1 ELSE quantity END WHERE album_id IN (SELECT album_id FROM top_selling_albums WHERE sales_count > 100);
